messages.speech: Shelf stabilization is a process through which foods are packaged in such a way that they can reach a shelf life far longer than what they normally would have in an open unsealed container.  Our products are shelf stable and have a shelf life of up 24 months from the date of packaging.  Our pouches are just like cans from a shelf life point of view except they are packaged in what is called flexible packaging.

speech: Is there anything I can help you with?
Anything else I can do for you?
